value.title: Open your Power BI Desktop model in Excel with just one click (two methods)

value.title: Exclude Blank Records from Distinct Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with the DAX series. Today I‚Äôm going to explain one DAX function in Power BI which is ‚Äì DISTINCTCOUNTNOBLANK()   When we use the DISTICTCOUNT() function in Power BI this will calculate distinct count for the column.
